QuestData.Title: Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Dark Iron Ore
QuestData.CompletionText: Dark Iron, while plentiful in the Depths, is still a valued commodity amongst the Brotherhood. The sacred arms and armaments of Ragnaros favor Dark Iron.$B$BFor every 10 pieces of Dark Iron Ore you offer, favor amongst the Brotherhood you will gain.
QuestData.RewardText: Your offering has been accepted. Favor you have gained. Continue and you shall be allowed access to the ancient trades.
